member.name: T:UserApi.Controllers.UsersController
member.summary: Uploads data from a .csv file to the database.

member.name: M:UserApi.Controllers.UsersController.GetUsers(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Get users sorted by username in ascending or descending order.
member.param: Sorting direction: "asc" for ascending, "desc" for descending.

member.name: M:UserApi.Controllers.UsersController.UploadCsv(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.IFormFile)
member.summary: Uploads a CSV file containing user data to the database.
member.returns: A response indicating the result of the upload.
